author: Phillip Jeffrey
description: Gin botanicals with Chartreause's complex herbal notes bolstered by rosemary. Spirituous and lightly sweet. Best enjoyed after dinner.
name: Mary Rose
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
